c74object.name: maxscore.tonejs
c74object.digest: Play back MaxScore note events in a browser.
c74object.description:
MaxScore.Tonejs
is a Max abstration capable of uploading bank files to as well as playing back samples in cent precision in Internet browsers via the drawsocket extension thus enabling multitimbral and microtonal playback. There are few caveats that need to be considered. There needs to be a folder called "public" in the same folder that contains the Max patcher with the MaxScore.tonejs instance. In this folder, you'll need to create another folder called Samples with subfolders holding the actual samples. These folders need to have the exact same names as the instrument files (without the .instr extension). Sample banks can be constructed with the MaxScore Sampler. Make sure the users click in the browser window before uploading the samples.

method.name: symbol
method.description:
MaxScore.tonejs
uploads bank files to and triggers sample file playback on Internet browsers.
